wikipedia_page.main: Gilbert Holiday (29 January 1879 – 8 January 1937) was a British painter. His work was part of the painting event in the art competition at the 1932 Summer Olympics.

response: Holiday died on 15 April 1927 in London, two years after his wife, Kate. His nephew, Gilbert Holiday (1879–1937), son of Sir Frederick Holiday, was also an artistGilbert Joseph Holiday who also has paintings in British collections.
